doc.previous: This important event followed a request made by the Wai Wai community to the government of Guyana and Conservation International Guyana CIG for assistance in developing a sustainable plan for their lands in Konashen The three parties signed a Memorandum of Cooperation which outlines a plan for sustainable use of the Konashen COCA s biological resources identifies threats to the area s biodiversity and helps develop projects to increase awareness of the COCA as well as generate the income necessary to maintain its protected status
